n.description: The number of copies to be compiled from file

nsamp.description: The number(s) of exercise files sampled from each list element of file

template.description: A specification of a LaTeX template

name.description: A name prefix for resulting exercises, by default chosen based on template

question.description: The header for resulting questions. FALSE removes the header for questions

solution.description: The header for resulting solutions. FALSE removes the header for solutions

mathjax.description: Should the JavaScript from http://www.MathJax.org/ be included for rendering mathematical formulas?

svg.description: Should graphics be rendered in SVG or PNG (default)?

encoding.description: The default encoding to assume for file
